name: Cheese Potatoes
author: Tina Blattel

ingredients.name: lb. potatoes, boiled, cooled, peeled and cubed
medium onion, chopped and sauteed in butter

instructions: Mix all ingredients together, except cheese. Add cheese to top of potato mixture. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Bake at 350Â° for 30 to 40 minutes in 9 x 13 dish with foil covering top. Make this a day ahead of time and bake just before serving.
